intro: Team up with a female sniper and take out the terrorists! Share the Joy-Con™ controller for a two-player arcade experience!
description:
Thwart the ambitions of terrorist organizations in a modern urban setting! Experience thrilling top-down action in bustling commercial districts and towering skyscrapers where intense battles unfold in the shadowy underground. Enjoy this immersive top-down shooter featuring tactical support and precise shooting by a skilled female sniper with exceptional analytical abilities. The game supports one to two players. By sharing a Joy-Con™ controller with another player, you can start cooperative gameplay anywhere, anytime.

・This is an excellently controlled, action-packed, top-down shooting game.
・Share a Joy-Con™ controller with a friend and start playing together anywhere.
・Each stage features story-driven missions for an exciting gaming experience.
・Clear the final stage to unlock a cinematic ending sequence.
・Enjoy greater variety with Story Mode and additional game modes.
・EPISODE Mode: Battle through story-driven missions to achieve completion.
・INVADE Mode: Infiltrate enemy bases and repel waves of attacking enemies.
・DEFENSE Mode: Defend your position against relentless enemy assaults.
・Gain experience points and level up by clearing stages.
・Unlock new weapons as you level up.
・Enjoy intense combat with spectacular 3D graphics.
・A rich collection of diverse weapon designs.
・There is an engaging upgrade system for both characters and weapons.
・Clear the final stage for an emotional ending! What conclusion awaits?

Team up with a female sniper who possesses precise tactical analysis skills and perfect marksmanship. Together, you can upgrade weapons and characters while conquering numerous stages. Share a Joy-Con™ controller with a friend for co-op play anytime, anywhere. Play like in classic arcade games with up to two players to thwart the ambitions of terrorists and criminal organizations! Join the special forces and protect the city's peace and future! It's time to put an end to the urban darkness!

Prologue
Three a.m. The low rumble of helicopter rotors echoes between the city's towering skyscrapers.
Inside the aircraft, a Special Forces Ranger focuses intently on the final mission briefing coming through his headset
"Enemy forces have taken control of the entire downtown district." The mission commander's cold voice crackles through the communications system.
"Fortunately, all civilians have been evacuated. Neutralize the enemy's key strongholds swiftly, but minimize collateral damage."
On the opposite side of the helicopter, the sniper deployed with him is analyzing real-time intelligence on her tablet.
She studies enemy troop positions, building layouts, and projected entry routes. Her analysis of the intelligence and her covering fire are crucial to the success of the operation.

"Neptune Spear operation commencing!" The Ranger shouts as he completes his final equipment check.
He verifies the magazine of his assault rifle and reorganizes the gear in his vest, which contains pistols and grenades.
It's time to dive into the heart of the city.

The helicopter rapidly descends over the commercial district, approaching the rope deployment point.
Below, neon-lit buildings and empty streets stretch out before them.
This concrete jungle is about to become their battlefield.
